But in most cases, the duration between two years is calculated by subtracting the start year from the end year. So, 2009 - 2002 = 7 years. Therefore, his career spanned 7 years, not 8.

In Mike Hercus's case, from 2002 to 2009 inclusive is 8 years. So perhaps the span is indeed 8 years when counting each year individually.

So putting it all together:

- His career spanned 8 years.

Therefore, the claim that "the greatest number of drop from 1 player happen over the span of 8 year" is TRUE.
